issue.title: [CF 1167] Hasn't worked in months, re-installed multiple times
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Similarly, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type for your issue, and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. logging in
2. trying to load anything to do with TMW
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I expect it to work, it doesn't work

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
7.4.0

Do you have an error log of what happened?
Message: Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Options\AceOptions.lua:1108: attempt to call method 'SetDefaultSize' (a nil value)
Time: 10/06/15 19:29:12
Count: 9
Stack: [C]: in function `SetDefaultSize'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Options\AceOptions.lua:1108: in function `CompileOptions'
...ace\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:1222: in function `Load'
...s\IconModules\IconModule_IconEditorLoader\module.lua:78: in function <...s\IconModules\IconModule_IconEditorLoader\module.lua:67>
...lMeWhen\Components\Core\BaseClasses\ObjectModule.lua:42: in function <...lMeWhen\Components\Core\BaseClasses\ObjectModule.lua:39>
[C]: ?
[C]: ?

Locals:

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
lua error everytime i try to use TMW


> Posted by CurseForge user omfgnoneedforallthisshit | Imported from CurseForge issue #1167 | Raw

comments.body:
This ticket duplicates http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/tickets/1139-cannot-configure-icon/

You are probably using the Iskar Assist addon - update that addon to the latest version to fix the issue.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
